name: Time Psycho Hotcakes
description:
Time Psycho Hotcakes

Time Psycho Hotcakes is a modern bullet hell action-roguelike where time only moves when you do.

~ Controls ~

Movement - WASD
Primary Fire - Left Mouse Button
Power Shot - Right Mouse Button
Bomb - Spacebar
Fullscreen - F
Mute - M
Pause Menu - Escape or P

~ Scoring System ~

Gaining yencoins is essential for winning the game since you can spend those yencoins at the shop. Whenever you gain yencoins, those yencoins are multiplied by your meter bonus. Kill enemies to increase your meter. Kill enemies with your Power Shot or Bomb to pop your meter, which decreases your meter bonus until your meter runs out.



~ Deathbombing ~

When you are hit by an enemy bullet, you can prevent the damage if you bomb within a half second of getting hit.
